changes.change:
Features:
- Added As Dot option to Who Is Online.
- Added Global Support, making whatsapp work in ipad / ipod.
- Added No Delete Limit, removing the time limit to delete a message.
Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where Confirm Call could be bypassed. (Does not cover contacts app yet).
- Fixed one of the bugs with Who Is Calling, more reliable now, but still not perfect.
